name: In Infinite Fields
description:
"A Field might be the field of magical elements that compose spells. It might be the field of inhabitants of a particular castle, or of the teeth on the crocodile that swallowed the world one day, or of the people loved by the Queen as of her last day on earth. All of these things are Fields. All Fields are all of these things."

This is a solo RPG in which you create a Field, like one of the examples above. You will solve problems and redefine the rules of the game and, eventually, create something beautiful.

In other words, play this game to create, discover, and name a place that is your own-- the Field.

This game was made for the #DREAMJAM. It's my MATHDREAM.

Currently there's only Chapter 1. I'd love to make Chapter 2 at some point.
